thread.title: BRIEF-Tonix Pharmaceuticals Posts Q1 Loss Of $0.88 Per Share

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tonix Pharmaceuticals Posts Q1 Loss Of $0.88 Per Share
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Tonix Pharmaceuticals Holding Corp :
* TONIX PHARMACEUTICALS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES PROGRAMS UPDATE
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.88 * TOPLINE RESULTS FROM FULL PHASE 3 HONOR STUDY OF 550 PARTICIPANTS ANTICIPATED IN Q1 OF 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
